evidence.claim: MasterTax utilizes AWS S3 for data storage.
The platform ensures HIPAA compliance for health-related tax services.
MasterTax can handle FHIR format for healthcare data exchange.
Integration with EHR systems via X12 transaction sets is supported.
MasterTax offers REST APIs for developers to access tax-related services.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services identified on the site.
